title: Can‚Äôt disable hints
text: I used to play this game a couple years ago. I wanted to start playing again, so I downloaded the app and signed in to my old account. I deleted it 20 minutes later. I played for 5 minutes. The other 15 minutes were spent trying to find a way to disable hints. At the time of this review, the only feature that can be disabled is the ‚Äúfantastic five‚Äù feature. I‚Äôm disappointed and a little confused. What‚Äôs the point of a strategy game when you‚Äôre being told where all the moves are? Where‚Äôs the strategy in that?

title: Only game I play!
text: I am A Long Time Player of candy crush. Almost to level 6,000. I get through the levels to fast. I have to wait for updates for new levels. The updates for the game says that it is updated every week. Been waiting 3 days for new levels. I guess I am impatient and need to get my CC fix. Please add more levels sooner.

title: Not inclusive for the blind community
text: We cannot play this game with out full accessibility support and the app. We cannot see the screen, that is why we are asking for a accessibility patch built into the app in the next update please. We need voice guidance too play the games. Try playing the games with a blind fold on, the original game and the modified one and see witch one you would win? I wish all developers would walk a mile in our shoes to see what we go through every day!!!!!

title: KT
text: I want to start by saying I had stopped playing candy crush saga for about two years. It had become boring. I started playing again about 6 months ago. I like the new changes & updates to the game but developers...WHAT is the PURPOSE of the crowns???? One objective is to get boosters. The crowns offer NOTHING but confetti. POINTLESS!! Give us crowns WITH free boosters  for completing so many levels on the first try! Additionally, TWICE I‚Äôve come in 2nd place for the weekly race these past 2 weeks and didn‚Äôt get my prizes! The race ends without warning & a new race begins. But NO PRIZES! According to the race rules, the top 3 places get prizes! Additionally, why does the game take my black balls WITHOUT a stripe or candy bomb nearby?? That‚Äôs CHEATING!! Then the hard, harder, hardest levels come so close together, that there‚Äôs little opportunity to move ahead in the race once reaching the 2,000 levels. While the competition is ok, it seems that you‚Äôve forgotten that SOME ADULTS play the game to relax & as a pass time. It should‚Äôve cause frustration because you‚Äôre trying to force players to make booster purchases. We‚Äôre adults, not kids wanting to spend countless hours trying to get through one level of a game. Our lives consist of more than time on a game. So it would be greatly appreciated if you‚Äôd cut the crap and make the game fun again!!

title: Candy crush buying tools

title: Furious
text: I used to love playing this game. It was a great way to pass time and i had a bunch of special candy saved up that i would use on tough levels and then all of sudden they disappeared. Please whoever manages this game tell me how its right to take away something that ive worked hard to achieve on this game? I saved those candies for MONTHS to get to where i was at! I am furious! I will no longer be spending money on this game and i will no longer support this game. They love to take things away that people work hard for.
